name: Lost Princess: Darkness
description:
Story:


Play this third part of Lost Princess FPS walking simulation where mission is to collect hidden items to get achievements and try to find Princess in darkland. . Player start his journey at darkforest and mission is to collect different items which gives achievements and when player finds Princess journey is finished. So explorer big open dark world and try find all items

Features:

- lot of collectable items which gives steam achievements
- Big and dark world where mission to find princess
